messages: b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:30): So someone gave me a .pptx document
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:30): I guess I need to download some beta stuff from MS to be able to read it?
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:30): What exactly do I need =\
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:31): Ask the Internet.
e68e2780c48502a3051bde215159515f (09:31): whats the app that made it?
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:31): http://www.google.com/search?q=extension+pptx&start=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:31): Like this
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:31): Click the first or third links and you'll have your answer.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:32): The Internet is smart.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:32): Identifying Characters [What's This?]
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:32): (None or Unknown)
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:32): Program ID [What's This?]
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:32): (None or Unknown)
de5057fbbac6623965fe11701309c7fb (09:32): www.filext.com
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:33): The Microsoft Office 2007 Powerpoint Open XML document format.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:33): I know WHAT it is.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:33): I don't know what to open it with :)
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:33): You need PowerPoint 2007.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:33): Ostensibly a beta was used to create the file (unless there are plugins out there I don't know about)
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:33): All I see for download are sharepoint and nothing about powerpoint.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:34): Or perhaps PowerPoint 2007 was already released?
de5057fbbac6623965fe11701309c7fb (09:34): Although, according to filext.com, it's -supposed- to be an open format.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:34): Inside: I don't think you'll be able to download it--it'll probably cost a bit.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:35): Well, he said I should still be able to download from the MS site, whatever created it.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:35): Ask him to convert to a regular .ppt.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:35): Why do people feel the need to go out and make brand new shiny things when there are things as is that are just as good and perfect.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:35): Yeah, he's off for the night -_-
e68e2780c48502a3051bde215159515f (09:35): why dont you send it to someone who can open it for you and tell you what it says.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:36): Well, that's why I poked my head in here, I thought you guys would be windows gurus D:
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:36): Nothing could be further from the truth, Ardonik-wise
de5057fbbac6623965fe11701309c7fb (09:36): Inside, perhaps you don't know about today's mass-market corporate software economics.
de5057fbbac6623965fe11701309c7fb (09:36): You see, when new software comes, it's sometimes not all that new...
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:37): Heh :P
e68e2780c48502a3051bde215159515f (09:40): its called renewing the ripoff.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:40): I realised.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:40): I don't see any difference really between word 97 which came with my last pc and word 2002 which I have on this pc.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:40): Sure, this look a bit prettier, but word 97 felt like it ran faster on my windows 98 machine than 2002 on this one.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:41): I tend to save as RTF and PDF to avoid compatibility problems.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (09:41): I've been doing that for quite a while now.
b241f634afdab730cc5610c22e0eba42 (09:41): Yeah, this guy feels the need to save everything in the newest format that comes out.
